title: [DOC] Collection of Documentation issues to get started on!
body:
## Welcome to sktime!

Here is a collection of several good "documentation" issues that we are looking for people to take on! 

If you are interested in working on a particular problem we ask that you say so in a comment to avoid the issue of multiple people working on the same problem.

This issue will be updated with more issues/work items through Nov 16th.  We encourage you to check out our [contributing guide](https://www.sktime.org/en/latest/get_involved/contributing.html) and/or ask for help (the contributors channel on slack is also a good place to reach out!) if you get stuck!  [This issue](https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/1147) on good first issues and getting started also has a lot of great suggestions/resources for your first contribution to sktime. 

### Some open issues :
(more will be added)

- [x] #3421
- [ ] #3314
- [ ] #3717
- [ ] #3716
- [x] #2019
- [ ] #3680

[Here is a link](https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22documentation%22+) to all open "documentation" issues so that you can check out even more pending issues to work on!
